PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Name_LangKey: Language Key for the name of the object
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Value_NAME_OF_: Value of a specific field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_LangKey_NAME_O: Language key for the value of a specific field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_List_Sta: Start of the attribute list. Will be replaced by the unused fields oder all fields placeholder when beeing integrated into an object.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_List_End: End of the attribute list. Will be replaced by the unused fields oder all fields placeholder when beeing integrated into an object.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields: List of unused flex field values. The attribute list template will be used for this and the start and end placeholders will be replaced with the unused fields placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields_S: Start of the list of unused fields. Non used fields are all fields that were not referenced by name.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields_E: End of the list of unused fields.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields: List of all flex field values. The attribute list template will be used for this and the start and end placeholders will be replaced with the all fields placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields_Star: Start of the list of all fields
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields_End: End of the list of all fields
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_LangKey: Language key for the value of the field. Used if you want to use localization instead of hard coding a string value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsNumber: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a number field. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsNumberField_End
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a number field.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsString: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a text field. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsStringField_End
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a text field.
